channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-8227] NPE w/ hive on tez when doing unions on empty tables
item.description: We're looking at aliasToWork.values() to determine input paths etc. This can contain nulls when we're scanning empty tables.
item.summary: NPE w/ hive on tez when doing unions on empty tables

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: vikram.dixit can you take a look please?
